member.name: P:kasuNhentaiCS.library.BookObj.uploaded
member.summary: • Hokusai made The Dream of the Fisherman's Wife in 1814, the earliest known Tentacle hentai. In 1722 the government made a law banning hentai manga, which means it was common even earlier. Suzumi-fune is probably the oldest hentai anime, it's from 1932.

member.summary:
Gets the "Script's JSON.parse" in the HTML

member.summary:
Its for the URL replacer like

member.name: F:kasuNhentaiCS.library.matcherRegex.TAGregex
member.summary: Its still a URL replacer but this time it is really for the URL.

member.name: T:kasuNhentaiCS._Matcher
member.summary:
[Brain of the operation]
Parses the Html string into an object.

member.name: M:kasuNhentaiCS._Matcher.BOOKnet(System.String)
member.summary: Requests for the website's Html into string and parses it in to an object.
member.param:
book url
Examples:
https://nhentai.net/g/228922
https://nhentai.net/g/128323
https://nhentai.net/g/1
member.returns: A representation of the parsed html

member.name: M:kasuNhentaiCS._Matcher.BOOKto(System.String)
member.summary: Requests for the website's Html into string and parses it in to an object.
member.param:
book url
Examples:
https://nhentai.to/g/27382
https://nhentai.to/g/33234
https://nhentai.to/g/12345
member.returns: A representation of the parsed html

member.name: M:kasuNhentaiCS._Matcher.PageInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Requests for the or website's Html into string and parses it in to an object.
member.param:
or url
Examples:
For .net:
https://nhentai.net/
https://nhentai.net/tag/crossdressing
and more.. For .to:
https://nhentai.to/
https://nhentai.to/tag/crossdressing
and more..
Heck you can even get the "More Like This" section in the
book url. But it's only available in the .net domain
member.returns: A representation of the parsed html

member.name: T:kasuNhentaiCS.Parser
member.summary:
A class for Book and Page.
For this time only "book" method is currently supported
while "page" method is still work in progress.

member.name: M:kasuNhentaiCS.Parser.book(kasuNhentaiCS.nhentaiURL)
member.summary:
Nhentai.net | Nhentai.to
Request Book object data from the url

member.name: M:kasuNhentaiCS.Parser.book(System.String)
member.summary:
Nhentai.net | Nhentai.to
Request Book object data from the url
member.param:
".net" or ".to" are fully supported.
but It doesnt support numbers yet only full links.
e.g:
https://nhentai.net/g/227834/
https://nhentai.to/g/132446/
[Warning] You are using a string type.
Though it still supports it but its better to
parse the link using Or you're just lazy no offense.
